author: mmusich
body:
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39911

#### PR description:

Title says it all.

#### PR validation:
```
$ runTheMatrix.py -nel 20834.501,20834.21,20834.5,20834.502 
```

now yields

```
20834.21 2026D88_ProdLike+TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTrigger+RecoGlobal+MiniAOD [1]: cmsDriver.py TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_cfi  -s GEN,SIM -n 10 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --beamspot HLLHC14TeV --datatier GEN-SIM --eventcontent RAWSIM --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9 --relval 9000,100 
                                           [2]: cmsDriver.py step2  -s DIGI,L1TrackTrigger,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:@fake2 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW -n 10 --eventcontent RAWSIM --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9
                                           [3]: cmsDriver.py step3  -s RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,RECOSIM --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier AODSIM -n 10 --eventcontent AODSIM --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9
                                           [4]: cmsDriver.py step4  -s PAT --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier MINIAODSIM -n 10 --eventcontent MINIAODSIM --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9

20834.5 2026D88_pixelTrackingOnly+TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTrigger+RecoGlobal+HARVESTGlobal [1]: cmsDriver.py TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_cfi  -s GEN,SIM -n 10 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --beamspot HLLHC14TeV --datatier GEN-SIM --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9 --relval 9000,100 
                                           [2]: cmsDriver.py step2  -s DIGI:pdigi_valid,L1TrackTrigger,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:@fake2 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW -n 10 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9
                                           [3]: cmsDriver.py step3  -s RAW2DIGI:RawToDigi_pixelOnly,RECO:reconstruction_pixelTrackingOnly,VALIDATION:@pixelTrackingOnlyValidation,DQM:@pixelTrackingOnlyDQM --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier GEN-SIM-RECO,DQMIO -n 10 --eventcontent RECOSIM,DQM --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9
                                           [4]: cmsDriver.py step4  -s HARVESTING:@trackingOnlyValidation+@pixelTrackingOnlyDQM --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --mc  --geometry Extended2026D88 --scenario pp --filetype DQM --era Phase2C17I13M9 -n 100 

20834.501 2026D88_Patatrack_PixelOnlyCPU+TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTrigger+RecoGlobal+HARVESTGlobal [1]: cmsDriver.py TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_cfi  -s GEN,SIM -n 10 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --beamspot HLLHC14TeV --datatier GEN-SIM --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9 --relval 9000,100 
                                           [2]: cmsDriver.py step2  -s DIGI:pdigi_valid,L1TrackTrigger,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:@fake2 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW -n 10 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9
                                           [3]: cmsDriver.py step3  -s RAW2DIGI:RawToDigi_pixelOnly,RECO:reconstruction_pixelTrackingOnly,VALIDATION:@pixelTrackingOnlyValidation,DQM:@pixelTrackingOnlyDQM --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier GEN-SIM-RECO,DQMIO -n 10 --eventcontent RECOSIM,DQM --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9 --procModifiers pixelNtupletFit
                                           [4]: cmsDriver.py step4  -s HARVESTING:@trackingOnlyValidation+@pixelTrackingOnlyDQM --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --mc  --geometry Extended2026D88 --scenario pp --filetype DQM --era Phase2C17I13M9 -n 100 

20834.502 2026D88_Patatrack_PixelOnlyGPU+TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTrigger+RecoGlobal+HARVESTGlobal [1]: cmsDriver.py TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_cfi  -s GEN,SIM -n 10 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --beamspot HLLHC14TeV --datatier GEN-SIM --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9 --relval 9000,100 
                                           [2]: cmsDriver.py step2  -s DIGI:pdigi_valid,L1TrackTrigger,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:@fake2 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW -n 10 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9 --procModifiers gpu
                                           [3]: cmsDriver.py step3  -s RAW2DIGI:RawToDigi_pixelOnly,RECO:reconstruction_pixelTrackingOnly,VALIDATION:@pixelTrackingOnlyValidation,DQM:@pixelTrackingOnlyDQM --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier GEN-SIM-RECO,DQMIO -n 10 --eventcontent RECOSIM,DQM --geometry Extended2026D88 --era Phase2C17I13M9 --procModifiers pixelNtupletFit,gpu
                                           [4]: cmsDriver.py step4  -s HARVESTING:@trackingOnlyValidation+@pixelTrackingOnlyDQM --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --mc  --geometry Extended2026D88 --scenario pp --filetype DQM --era Phase2C17I13M9 -n 100 
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Will add this commit to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39898 as part of the backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39858.
title: add protection for AlCa step in several specialized phase-2 workflows
